LanguageData.RM_Turret_AutoShardLance.label: shard lance turret
LanguageData.RM_Turret_AutoShardLance.description: A rail-assisted crystalline turret capable of launching unstable shards at a dizzying speed towards targets.\n\nShould enough shards hit the same target to hit critical mass, the energy will destabilise and trigger an explosion.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_AutoShardLance.label: auto shard lance
LanguageData.RM_Gun_AutoShardLance.description: A salvaged mechanoid shard lance made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.RM_Turret_AutoShardSwarmer.label: shard swarmer turret
LanguageData.RM_Turret_AutoShardSwarmer.description: A large crystalline turret capable of launching a large volley of homing shards towards targets. While slow, the shards will home in on their target.\n\nShould enough shards hit the same target to hit critical mass, the energy will destabilise and trigger an explosion.
LanguageData.RM_Gun_AutoShardSwarmer.label: auto hshard swarmer
LanguageData.RM_Gun_AutoShardSwarmer.description: A salvaged mechanoid shard swarmer made to be mounted on a turret.
